welcome_message_body: Welcome to Wako, Japan! Known for its beautiful cherry blossoms and historical temples, we invite you to explore the city and enjoy its charm. We hope you have a wonderful time here.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights only.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The terminal exclusively for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport is used for military flights and operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.
